description: Create a job production plan inspector
permissions: Allowed for admins, broker members of the job production plan's broker, or developer managers of the job production plan's developer.
side_effects: Creates a job production plan inspector.
validation_notes: --job-production-plan-id and --user are required. job_production_plan_id and user relationship are create-only. The user must have a membership with the job production plan's developer. user_id must be unique within a job production plan.
